name: Triangle Tunes
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #111, Theme: Triangles (obviously) :)

Use the Arrow Keys to move. Click the New Song Button to try out a different track. Get as many of enemy triangles as you can. 

Comment your high score and song name!

Thanks to Nihilore (http://www.nihilore.com/) for the great music.
